code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import HttpApi from'i18next-http-backend';i18n.use(HttpApi).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({supportedLngs:['en','zh'],fallbackLng:'en',detection:{order:['cookie','localStorage','navigator','htmlTag','path','subdomain'],caches:['cookie']},backend:{loadPath:'/locales/{{lng}}/translation.json'},react:{useSuspense:false}});export default i18n;
